subject: Re: [PATCH v5 1/1] NFSD: Enforce timeout on layout recall and integrate lease manager fencing

reviews.author: Christoph Hellwig
reviews.summary: Reviewer Christoph Hellwig suggested splitting the patch into two parts, one for core infrastructure and another for NFS daemon (nfsd) code.

reviews.author: Jeff Layton
reviews.summary: The reviewer raised concerns about the lease removal process, specifically when a client is fenced and the layout stateid's refcount goes to zero.

reviews.author: Dai Ngo (author)
reviews.summary: Reviewer Dai Ngo clarified the behavior of the fence worker and its impact on layout stateid reference counting.
